message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering the time pressure and the fact that the value decreases for me with each round.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split.  It accounts for the time pressure but is also more equitable.
Your offer is still not accounting enough for the decreasing value for me. Let's meet in the middle with 58/42. Time is running out!
Alice, I understand the time pressure is on you more than me. But I need a fair deal. This is my final offer.
